Translations.Text: (Umuhungu we yarabwiwe ati) "Yewe Yahaya! Akirana imbaraga iki gitabo (Tawurati). Kandi twamuhaye ubushishozi akiri muto
Ndetse twanamuhaye igikundiro nk’impuhwe ziduturutseho, tunamweza ibyaha kandi yubahaga Allah
Ndetse yumviraga ababyeyi be kandi ntiyari umwirasi cyangwa ngo yigomeke (kuri Allah ndetse no ku babyeyi be)
Amahoro ni abe kuri we umunsi yavukiyeho, umunsi azapfiraho ndetse n’umunsi azazurirwaho
Babwire inkuru ya Mariyamu mu gitabo (cya Qur’an, yewe Muhamadi), ubwo yitaruraga umuryango we akajya ahagana iburasirazuba
Maze agashyira urusika hagati ye na bo, nuko tumwoherereza Roho wacu (Malayika Gaburiyeri) amwiyereka mu ishusho ry’umugabo wiyubashye
(Mariyamu) aravuga ati "Mu by’ukuri, niragije Nyagasani Nyirimpuhwe ngo andinde ikibi cyaguturukaho, niba koko wubaha Allah
(Malayika) aravuga ati "Mu by’ukuri, ndi intumwa ya Nyagasani wawe ije kuguha (inkuru) y’impano y’umuhungu wejejwe (ibyaha)
(Mariyamu) aravuga ati "Ni gute nagira umuhungu kandi nta mugabo nigeze, ndetse nkaba ntarigeze niyandarika

(Malayika) aramubwira ati "Uko ni ko bizagenda!Nyagasani wawe aravuze ati "Ibyo kuri njye biroroshye. (Turashaka) kumugira ikimenyetso ku bantu (kigaragaza ubushobozi bwacu) n’impuhwe ziduturutseho, kandi iryo ni iteka ryamaze gucibwa
Nuko ibise bimujyana ku giti cy’umutende, aravuga ati "Mbega ububabare! Iyo nza kuba narapfuye mbere y’ibi, nkanibagirana burundu
Nuko (yumva ijwi) munsi ye rimuhamagara rigira riti "Ntugire agahinda! Rwose Nyagasani wawe yashyize isoko y’amazi munsi yawe
Unanyeganyeze igiti cy’umutende, kirakumanurira itende nziza kandi zihishije
